meanings.definition: To estimate the value or worth of something.
meanings.sent1: She was apprizing the cost of the new car.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent is apprizing the value of the house.
meanings.sent3: While apprizing the antique vase, she accidentally knocked it over.
meanings.sent4: His eyes apprized the painting with admiration.
meanings.sent5: Apprizing the jewelry required a keen eye for detail.

meanings.sent1: He apprized his friend of the upcoming party.
meanings.sent2: The teacher apprizes the students of the test schedule.
meanings.sent3: She apprized her cat of the new house rules.
meanings.sent4: The alarm apprized the neighborhood of the fire.
meanings.sent5: Apprizing the team of the victory brought smiles all around.
